explains: adj. 亲密的；个人的，隐私的；温馨的，幽静舒适的；详尽的，精通的；密切的，紧密的；有性关系的，暧昧的
v. 透露，暗示；宣布，通告

sentences.en: He wrote about the intimate details of his family life.
sentences.cn: 他写下了家庭生活中一些私人的细节。

sentences.en: The cafe has an intimate but buzzy atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 咖啡馆气氛暧昧但又很活泼。

sentences.en: We're not on intimate terms with our neighbours.
